title: Can't update the client cause of logs?!?!?
body: Everytime i try to update my log it says there is an error and something about logs and stuff and ive checked online and on the support pages but i cant seem to find anything about this problem please somebody help im on windows 10 aswell

replies.body: Idk it just says there is an error when i try to update it and it says to checks logs and try again

Could you try the following and let me know if it helps

Delete your lol_air_client project folder located at: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\ and then re launch the patcher.

Hey there,

Could you be more specific about the error you're receiving "Something about logs and stuff" isn't very helpful in diagnosing your issue.
